title: Camille Bloodmoon Skin concept
body: I created this Bloodmoon/Jade/Warring Kingdoms, etc. themed Camille skin. Hope you like it!

replies.body:
Would be appropriately timed with the Ghost In The Shell movie coming soon

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/3aqc36Bj6ik/maxresdefault.jpg
Exactly what inspired me! Thought the whole Geisha robot thing fit so well
Geishas and/or robots and/or specifically geisha robots; not copyright at all..
You cant copyright a Geisha robot lol.
damn that was fast lol but nice concept i like the ghost in the shell face paint

This skin would look awesome in - game! I would also like to see some custom animations for Blood Moon Camille to make it special ^^ The only thing that should change are the leg swords, cuz they look kinda awkward. {{champion:164}}
Even if its a Ghost in the Shell inspired skin, it looks so much like she just got hit by a baseball ball right in the face, she even looks surprised

The mask is missing. 
.__.

Sry, someone had to be that guy. xD
But beside that, I like it.

EDIT: HOLY I just had a great idea for bloodmoon Camille! The bloodmoon skin line is mostly based on youkai, japanese demons. One of these demons is Kuchisake-Onna (google if you dare). Each of her legs would be one half of a scissor. It just fits perfeclty. ;_;
